title: VAVA’s Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals knock a huge $600 off any projector
author: sponsored
summary: Get big screen entertainment for less
article: If you’re looking for a killer deal on projectors then VAVA has you covered, as its Black Friday and Cyber Monday special takes $600 off the 4K Laser TV. For movie fans and gamers, this is an excellent way to bring big screen entertainment to your home this holiday season.

VAVA is an up and coming player, making a range of seriously impressive products to take on more established – and expensive – rivals, and these huge savings means Black Friday is the perfect time to check out VAVA’s projectors.
If you’re not after a projector, then VAVA is also offering 20% off all of its products, including the VAVA Baby Monitor, Baby Cam and Night Light, which are all ideal for new parents.
You can also save 20% off its 1080p dash camera for your car, and for anyone who is now working from home, VAVA’s 2K Webcam will be the ideal holiday gift.
If you want a stunning cinema-like experience in your own home, the VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser TV is for you, especially with $600 off.

Simply place the VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser TV in front of your wall, and instantly adjust the screen between 80 inches to a huge 150 inches. It only needs to be 7.2-inches away from the wall to get 100-inch screen size, saving you a huge amount of space compared to a standard TV of that size.

With 4K UHD resolution, HDR10 support and Digital Light Processing technology, you’re also getting stunning image quality that will make your movies and games look phenomenal. You’ll be able to see every detail with a whopping 8.3 million pixels.

With no extra wires thanks to built-in speakers and Android TV, and a quick and easy setup, you can place the VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser TV anywhere you like, making it perfect for homes, offices and even outside.

A cinematic experience isn’t all about the visuals either. The VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser TV brings authentic theatre sound thanks to a built-in Harman Kardon speaker with two 30W drivers, and supports DTS-HD and Dolby Audio.
To compliment the VAVA 4K Ultra Short Throw Laser TV and ensure the very best visual quality, make sure to pair it with the VAVA Ambient Light Rejecting (ALR) Projector Screen Pro.

This huge 100-inch screen rejects up to 92% of overhead ambient light, bringing you crisp and vivid colors any time of day. This is thanks to serriform microstructure on the screen’s surface, leaving projected images to look their very best.

Designed specially for short-throw projectors, the VAVA Ambient Light Rejecting (ALR) Projector Screen Pro offers an easy way to get stunning 100-inch entertainment with just a 0.4-inch slim easy-install aluminium frame.

For new parents who want to make sure their precious family members are safe and sound, VAVA has a large range of smart devices that can put your mind at rest – all with 20% off over Black Friday weekend.

The VAVA Smart Baby Thermometer gives you real-time temperature monitoring to help you ensure that the room temperature is perfect for your little one. With all-day monitoring, you can relax, knowing that if the room gets too hot or too cold, you’ll be alerted instantly.

If you want to check up on your baby at any time, the VAVA 720P Video Baby Monitor can offer real peace of mind, allowing you to see what your little one is up to, even when you’re on the other side of the house. It comes with a large 5-inch HD display, and two-way talk system so you can soothe your baby when you’re out of the room.

If you have a larger family, then the VAVA Baby Monitor with Split Screen is a great choice, allowing you to view two rooms at once. You can also use the two cameras to offer you two different angles, which is ideal for larger rooms. All-day battery life lasts 10 hours with the live screen on, or 18 hours in audio-only mode.
If you want more coverage, you can connect up to two VAVA Add-on Baby Cameras for a total of four.

VAVA also offers an Outdoor Wireless Security Cam that can be fitted anywhere outside thanks to its weather-proof design, and offers you enhanced night vision and wide angle footage to allow you to check on your home while you’re away.

With bank-level data encryption, you can be safe with the knowledge that only you have access to the footage. Between the choice of one or two camera kits with add-on cameras available, the VAVA Outdoor Wireless Security Cam system can protect your entire home, no matter how large your property is.
So, with $600 off projectors and 20% off the rest of its products, Black Friday and Cyber Monday are the perfect time to see what VAVA has to offer.
